title: Interfacial chemistry in multivalent aqueous batteries: fundamentals, challenges, and advances
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, 53,8980-9028
DOI: 10.1039/D4CS00474D, Tutorial Review
Zhengyu Ju, Tianrui Zheng, Bowen Zhang, Guihua Yu
This invited tutorial review presents key design principles for interfacial engineering in multivalent aqueous batteries including deposition regulation, ion flux homogenization, and solvation modulation.
